quest.name: Ghosts of Honor
journal:
Seigetsu the Enlightened hopes to enlist the aid of ancient Namazu spirits.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

You have spoken with the Namazu steward.
Deliver the requested supplies to Seigetsu the Enlightened.
objectives: Synthesize [Error]Deliver [Error] to Seigetsu the EnlightenedMine [Error] to the south of Chakha ZohGather [Error] to the south of Chakha ZohDeliver [Error] Seigetsu the EnlightenedCatch [Error] at Tao Khaal.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: The Chrysanthemum and the Dango describes a Hingan ritual in which the spirits of their ancestors are beckoned into the home to ensure a bountiful harvest.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: We will perform these selfsame rites here in Dhoro Iloh. Should the souls of our forebears answer the call, their divine protection may prove instrumental in averting our impending doom.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: One of the Seven Hundred Seventy-Seven is searching the plains for the necessary offerings. As this was not originally a custom of the Namazu, there may be matters best handled by someone with...hands. Think of it as another opportunity to prove your usefulness!

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03111
dialogue.text: Did Gyofun...I mean, Seigetsu the Enlightened send you? I'm so inundated with tasks, I can't possibly manage them alone. I need your help!

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03111
dialogue.text: We need traditional serving trays to present the food for the kami! Please, look inside that crate and see if there's anything you can use!

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03111
dialogue.text: We need a traditional serving mat to present the offerings! Please, look inside that crate and see if there's anything you can use!

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03111
dialogue.text: We need traditional delicacies to present as offerings! Please, look inside that crate and see if there's anything you can use!

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03111
dialogue.text: I was told to gather steppe clay for making traditional Hingan crockery. You'll go and get some for me, won't you? Try searching a little south of Chakha Zoh. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03111
dialogue.text: I was told to gather ingredients for traditional Hingan dishes, but I can't find any edible buds! I heard they grow south of Chakha Zoh, but I couldn't find any for the life of me. Perhaps you will have better luck. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03111
dialogue.text: We need a steppe sweetfish, the centerpiece of the offerings! Could you catch one from Tao Khaal? Apparently, they are drawn to the smell of salmon roe. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03111
dialogue.text: When you're done, please go straight to Seigetsu. He is insistent that he is the only one capable of arranging the offerings as tradition dictates. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03111
dialogue.text: Did you have a mishap? Not to worry, there are more materials in the crate.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03111
dialogue.text: Did you have a mishap? Not to worry, there are more materials in the crate.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03111
dialogue.text: So the delicacy didn't turn out as well as you'd hoped? Not to worry, there are more ingredients in the crate.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03111
dialogue.text: You can't find any steppe clay? Try looking south of Chakha Zoh.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03111
dialogue.text: You can't find any edible buds? Try looking south of Chakha Zoh.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03111
dialogue.text: Are the steppe sweetfish eluding you? There should be plenty in Tao Khaal. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03111
dialogue.text: You've done ever so well! I'm sure Seigetsu will approve. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Do you have something to present to me?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Let me see... Yes, yes, perfectly adequate. Once the offerings have been suitably blessed and arranged, all that will remain is to perform the ritual itself.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Part of the ceremony involves enacting a banquet as though our long-dead ancestors are corporeally present. The process is extremely lengthy and involves chanting in an ancient Hingan tongue.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: I dare not entrust such a delicate task to any of my Namazu brethren, who would no doubt botch the incantations and leave us all cursed to eternal damnation.
